text: Madi be “gbe bubuwo gbɔgblɔ” ƒe nunana nanɔ mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe si, ke nu si wu esiae nye be mi katã miate ŋu agblɔ nya ɖi, agblɔ Mawu ƒe nya, elabena esia nye ŋusẽ gã kple ŋusẽ si ŋu viɖe le wu be woagblɔ gbe manyamanyawo, negbe ne miate ŋu aɖe nya siwo miegblɔ la gɔme na amewo emegbe, ale be hame la nakpɔ ŋgɔdede.
